articles.title: The OnePlus Watch 2 is what redemption looks like - The Verge
articles.description: The $299.99 OnePlus Watch 2 is a massive improvement over the original. It’s a great alternative to Google and Samsung’s Wear OS smartwatches.
articles.content:
OnePlus could be a strong alternative to Google or Samsung for Wear OS smartwatches.
